title: Bootstrap 3 Bootcamp
desc: Learn how to build a Bootstrap website in a weekend. Designed for Everyone.?Bootstrap, an open source front-end framework, is one of the most popular for building responsive websites. In this hands-on bootcamp, shaRon will demonstrate how to use Bootstrap as a foundation in your next web design project. Follow along and learn how to build a Bootstrap-based website from scratch, incorporating the responsive grid system, see the basic CSS in action, incorporate Javascript-based components, and customize CSS. In this hands-on workshop, we will cover: Prereqs & Preparation Please bring your laptop Sublime Text or other text editor Students should have a solid understanding of hand-coded HTML5. Some background in CSS, and JavaScript/jQuery is nice, but not required. Level: Beginner/Intermediate About the Instructor sharon-folio.com For years, shaRon has been educating clients, colleagues, friends and students about modern web development/ design techniques. Dwelling in Drupal is her preference, but as a front end developer she also uses HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Wordpress, Bootstrap, Jquery and PHP. She has built websites that are supportive of business and marketing goals in a freelance capacity and as part of an agency. shaRon is also available for individual private tutoring, customized corporate training, and consulting.
